attr.title: Thy Sword
attr.desc: Thy Sword is a hack n' slash platformer with procedural levels and roguelike elements.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Steam OR Itch.io
Download the game and place the data.win into ports/thysword/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/560300/Thy_Sword/) OR [Itch.io](https://gamephase.itch.io/thy-sword)
Download the game and place the data.win into ports/thysword/gamedata
